name: Oyster and Cornbread Dressing
author: DUNCANS FAVORITES
summary: Each year I am asked to make this wonderful dressing. The recipe has been in my family for years. Chopped oysters and chicken broth make it very moist and flavorful. For an even more moist dressing, use more chicken broth.
directions: Prepare the corn bread according to package directions
Allow bread to cool, then crumble into a large bowl
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 9x9 inch baking pan
Over medium-low heat melt butter in a large saucepan
Mix in the onions and celery
Cook slowly, stirring occasionally until onions are soft
Transfer to the bowl with bread crumbs
Mix oysters, eggs, pepper, poultry seasoning, sage, chicken broth and reserved oyster liquid  into the corn bread mixture
Bake uncovered in the preheated oven 45 minutes
